tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TradeMatchingEngine (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    buy_order_id INT,
    buy_quantity DECIMAL,
    sell_order_id INT,
    sell_quantity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE trade_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_type VARCHAR(20),
    order_quantity INT,
    order_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    order_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE buy_orders (
    buy_order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    buy_order_type VARCHAR(20),
    buy_quantity INT,
    buy_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    buy_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE sell_orders (
    sell_order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sell_order_type VARCHAR(20),
    sell_quantity INT,
    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    sell_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE buy_orders (
  order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sell_orders (
  order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE order_book (
  order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  buy_order_id INT REFERENCES buy_orders(order_id),
  sell_order_id INT REFERENCES sell_orders(order_id),
  trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  trade_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
  trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  buy_order_id INT REFERENCES buy_orders(order_id),
  sell_order_id INT REFERENCES sell_orders(order_id),
  trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  trade_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE buy_orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sell_orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
